sqlMap.select:
/* faa/cav/043/FAACAV043EMainTotOutSelect1 */
/*총세입세출결산내역*/ SELECT ROWNUM AS KEY, CLSG_DVSN_CD, ACNT_CD, DECODE(SUM_DVSN_ID,'51','월계','49','합계',ACCT_CD||'-'|| SSEC_CD||'-'|| DITM_CD||'-'|| SITM_CD) AS ASDSCD, ACCT_CD,CHIF_CD,SSEC_CD, DITM_CD, SITM_CD, TOT_CLSG_AMT_1, TOT_CLSG_AMT_2, TOT_CLSG_AMT_3 FROM TWFAACAV061L WHERE 1=1 AND CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'A'
AND ACNT_YR = #strYr#
AND COPT_CD = #strCoptCd#
AND ACNT_CD = #strAcntCd#
AND BLL_CD = #strBllCd#
AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strProfDrtrSrno#
AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno#
ORDER BY KEY

/* faa/cav/043/FAACAV043EMainTotOutSelect2 */
/*기금결산내역*/ SELECT ROWNUM AS KEY, CLSG_TYP, ACNT_CD, DECODE(SUM_DVSN_ID,'51','월계','49','합계',ACCT_CD||'-'|| SSEC_CD||'-'|| DITM_CD||'-'|| SITM_CD) AS ASDSCD, ACCT_CD,CHIF_CD,SSEC_CD, DITM_CD, SITM_CD, FUND_CLSG_AMT_1, FUND_CLSG_AMT_2, FUND_CLSG_AMT_3 FROM TWFAACAV025L WHERE 1=1 AND CLSG_TYP = 'A'
AND ACNT_YR = #strYr#
AND COPT_CD = #strCoptCd#
AND ACNT_CD = #strAcntCd#
AND BLL_CD = #strBllCd#
AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strProfDrtrSrno#
AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno#
ORDER BY KEY

/* faa/cav/043/FAACAV043EMainTotInSelect1 */
/*총세입세출결산내역*/ SELECT ROWNUM AS KEY, CLSG_DVSN_CD, ACNT_CD, DECODE(SUM_DVSN_ID,'51','월계','49','합계',ACCT_CD||'-'|| SSEC_CD||'-'|| DITM_CD||'-'|| SITM_CD) AS ASDSCD, ACCT_CD,CHIF_CD,SSEC_CD, DITM_CD, SITM_CD, TOT_CLSG_AMT_1, TOT_CLSG_AMT_2, TOT_CLSG_AMT_5 AS TOT_CLSG_AMT_3 FROM TWFAACAV061L WHERE 1=1 AND CLSG_DVSN_CD = 'B'
AND ACNT_YR = #strYr#
AND COPT_CD = #strCoptCd#
AND ACNT_CD = #strAcntCd#
AND BLL_CD = #strBllCd#
AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strProfDrtrSrno#
AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno#
ORDER BY KEY

/* faa/cav/043/FAACAV043EMainTotInSelect2 */
/*기금결산내역*/ SELECT ROWNUM AS KEY, CLSG_TYP, ACNT_CD, DECODE(SUM_DVSN_ID,'51','월계','49','합계',ACCT_CD||'-'|| SSEC_CD||'-'|| DITM_CD||'-'|| SITM_CD) AS ASDSCD, ACCT_CD,CHIF_CD,SSEC_CD, DITM_CD, SITM_CD, FUND_CLSG_AMT_1, FUND_CLSG_AMT_2, FUND_CLSG_AMT_3 FROM TWFAACAV025L WHERE 1=1 AND CLSG_TYP = 'B'
AND ACNT_YR = #strYr#
AND COPT_CD = #strCoptCd#
AND ACNT_CD = #strAcntCd#
AND BLL_CD = #strBllCd#
AND PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strProfDrtrSrno#
AND DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strDlXpnRcdbPbsvtSrno#
ORDER BY KEY
